headline: From Coffee Grounds to Comfy Soles: The Science Behind Sunnystepâ€™s Sustainable Shoes
description: Yes, you read that rightyour next step could be powered by yesterdays coffee! At Sunnystep, were passionate about reducing waste, so weve partnered with the world's best material scientists to transform used coffee grounds into the fabric for the uppers of our Dream Sneakers, Dream Oxford, and Dream Mules.
